my Uncle Harry

the dream gives me pause to say, yeah, our

seeming appearance. On the other hand,

subtly, a story is told of the Buddha

And the Buddha said, “No.”

Later on
the Buddha's disciple Ananda,

why did you say that you don't believe

past lives? What was that

The Buddha explained to Ananda,

theology, that anything you can say about
